properties.description: Welcome to The Aggie – Your Community Hub in Bellfields & Slyfield The Aggie is at the heart of the community, offering a warm and friendly space for everyone. Our café is open Monday–Saturday from 7.30am–2pm, serving good food and hot drinks to start your day. We also have a private Members’ Lounge (open all week and welcoming new members), plus a large hall available to hire for parties, celebrations, classes, and events. Throughout the year, we host a wide variety of community activities — from seasonal events like Halloween, Christmas and Easter, to quiz nights, bingo, live music and more. We are proud to be part of the Warm Welcome Spaces UK — providing a safe, free and welcoming place to keep warm, connect with others, and feel supported. Visitors can enjoy a free hot drink, friendly conversation, and signposting to support services around finances, mental health, housing, and more (Mon - Fri 10am-12pm & 4pm-6pm) Our mission is to bring people together, help reduce isolation, and support wellbeing — while offering a space where everyone feels they belong.
properties.title: The Aggie Cafe & Social Club
